title: Oprah 2020? - Best of Coast to Coast AM - 1/8/18
itunes:title: Oprah 2020? - Best of Coast to Coast AM - 1/8/18
description:
After her speech at the Golden Globes, Oprah has people buzzing about a possible run at the Oval Office in 2020. Howard Bloom joins George to discuss.
